DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate efficacy safety use aboBTX-A improve wound heal prior Mohs micrographic surgery reconstruction skin cancer forehead
DOC.brief_title: Forehead Scars Following Mohs Micrographic Surgery Reconstruction Skin Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: - Outcomes Patient Observer Assessment Scale ( POSAS ) , Visual Analog Scale , Patient Satisfaction Survey . - Study consist 5 clinic visit approximately 6 month
DOC.criteria: Have biopsy prove skin cancer forehead amenable Mohs surgery Undergoing elective reconstruction biopsy proven skin cancer amenable Mohs surgery defect size measure 1.0 cm great If female , currently pregnant , currently breastfeed , potential pregnancy , childbearing age , agree use birth control . Agrees use disallow concomitant medication ( retinoids ) agree use sunscreen forehead area duration study Current past history neuromuscular disease ( myasthenia gravis , amyotrophic lateral sclerosis , EatonLambert syndrome ) History radiation therapy chemotherapy History keloid hypertrophic scar formation Has use botulinum toxin forehead area within one year . Has use topical retinoids forehead area within past 4 week Any hypersensitivity component abobotulinumtoxinA ( i.e . cow milk protein ) previous hypersensitivity botulinum toxin A related product .
